page.title: 14BEING DISABLED IN 1985
page.content: Swinton Court is a home where able and disabled people live together.It was opened by the Duchess of Kent in 1978. Mr.Buckland is in charge of the home.I talked to 2 disabled people,Roger and Michael.They told me what is was like to be disabled in 1985:"Its better than it was.People dont stare as much," Michael told us.I felt lucky to be myself.Our class saw the workshop. The jobs these people had to do ranged from simple tasks to more enjoyable jobs such as working in the toy workshop and printing.Some charities arrange holidays for the disabled people.
